name: untouched
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C1 not changed or spoiled in any way: Most of the east coast remains untouched by tourism.
If food is untouched, it has not been eaten: She took a few spoonfuls of soup but left her main course untouched.

not changed or spoiled in any way: These prewar apartment buildings have been virtually untouched since they were built.
If food is untouched, it has not been eaten: She left her dinner untouched.
